participant_1.background:
My first major purchase was my laptop, and I still use it every day.
my favorite jello is the blue one.
I value my friendships and family relationships above all else, and I make time for them every day.
i have a poodle named nanette.
my mom is an osteopath.

participant_2.background:
I lost my dog, and it still hurts to think about him.
i believe in fairytales.
i have a master s degree.
I want to wear my favorite dress and boots while watching Friends.
I spend time with my family and try to remember all the good times we've had.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am well, thank you for asking. I am just a bit sad because I miss my dog.
I am so sorry to hear that. I know how you feel. I had to put my dog down last year and it still hurts to think about him.
Thank you. It is always nice to talk to someone who understands.
Of course. What was your dog's name?
His name was Buddy. He was a golden retriever.
Oh, I love golden retrievers! They are such sweet dogs.
They are. He was the best dog ever. I had him for 14 years.
That is a long time. I am sure you have lots of wonderful memories with him.
I do. He was always there for me.
I am so sorry for your loss. But I am sure he is in a better place now.
Thank you. I believe that too.
What are you doing today to take your mind off of things?
I am going to watch Friends and eat ice cream.
That sounds like a good plan. I love Friends!
Me too! It is my favorite show.
I hope you have a good day.
